5253.quoteText:
When you visit the Site, we may use industry-wide technologies such as "cookies" (or similar technologies), which store certain information on your computer and which will allow us, among other things, to enable automatic sign-in to the Site, make your browsing much more convenient and effortless and allow us to test user experience and offer you personalized browsing or promotions.
By continuing to use this Site, you are agreeing to our placing cookies on your computer or device in accordance with the terms of this Policy.
5253.title: This service requires first-party cookies, which are cookies that only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

5255.quoteText: Some of these cookies are managed by third parties, and you may refer to the third parties' own website privacy notifications for further information.
5255.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information

tosdr.case: The service refers users to external documents for more information

5256.quoteText:
In particular, we use Google Analytics cookies to obtain an overall view of user habits and volumes, and to help improve the overall experience on the Site.
Google Analytics is a third-party web analysis service provided by Google Inc, which uses performance cookies and targeting cookies.
5256.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

5257.quoteText: Please be aware that some of our services will not function if your browser does not accept cookies.
5257.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

5258.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
tosdr.tldr: The Privacy Policy outlines details about personal information they collect.

5259.quoteText:
Our Site is not intended for children under 13 years of age.
No one under age 13 should provide any personal information to or on the Site.
We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
5259.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
